channel.description: Recent content in Social on Peter Jordan

item.title: The Ello Bill of Rights for Social Network Users
item.description: Ello, the ad-free social network, founded as an alternative to the status quo, has published a bill of rights for social network users. It has ten beliefs, starting with: You have the right to privacy You have the right not ot be tracked Find out more, and sign the petition.
